modName: Bearish looks with big junk cut
summary: Hi…  this is a modification and compilation, base on the instructions of “Nude male big penis” by Z32 to create that bearish look that we all love in men.
descriptionHtml:
Hi…  this is a modification and compilation, base on the instructions of “Nude male big penis” by Z32 to create that bearish look that we all love in men.

So all credits as with z32 are the same (Sundracon, AlienSlof, MysticBinary82 and Z32 for his instructions)

What I did here was putting in one package \"Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male\" by Sundracon, \"Sundracons Revealing Male Compilation\" also by Sundracon, \"Bodyhair Nude Male HD\" by MysticBinary82, and finally with the instructions by Z32 from \"Nude male big penis\" add big dicks while nude, but also add bigger dicks in all the Sundracons Revealing Male Compilation, so now, if you are nude, or equipped with this armors you all would be able to enjoy the z32 modification. Not that big a of a deal cause I’m not a madder yet. But it looks nice.

So.... Installation:

Download and unzip, and enter to the Personal \"Personal Hairy_Male_4K-265-1-6a\" folder.

There would be the a install instructions .txt which are the same that MysticBinary82 wrote.

Installation:


1. choose your favorite color (black, brown, blond, red)

2. Put the files from \"needed\" and \"needed\\[color]\" into
   [X]:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male

   (X = your Steam installation HDD)

3. Choose a Pattern and copy the files inside \"Pattern[choise]\", \"Pattern[choise]\\Head(if_folder_is_present)\\[color]\" to
   [X]:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male

4. Pick \"dirty\" or \"clean\" texture inside the \"pattern\" folder and select your previously chosen \"color\"
   Copy \"malebody_1.dds\" to the other files

5. For your character to be nude, choose the cut or natural version and copy the folder 
   into the Skyrim Data folder.

NOW...   go to the \"Personal Revealing_Compilation_Male_Cut_v1_1-3642\" folder and copy the correct folder into the Skyrim Data folder.

And there you have big bears with big dicks as in the pictures.


If any problems please tell me.

AND IF YOU LIKE IT...   PLEASE  \"ENDORSE ME\"  !!!!!
